entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.2°C

Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
